author: xsteve
msg: svn-status-edit-svn-command is no longer set wrong in some circumstances
fix a wrong value of svn-status-edit-svn-command after a call

author: pburba
msg: Fix Windows build which was broken in r32017 (support Berkeley DB 4.7).
(base_hotcopy): VS2005 chokes on the nested macros introduced in r32017.
Not sure if this is a C89 limitation or something odd with VS2005, but
removing the check_env_flags() call from within SVN_ERR() and checking
for an error separately fixes the build.
